attributes.action: TREAT LIBELLOUS MSM STORIES AIMED AT INDIVIDUALS OR ORGANISATIONS AS HATE CRIMES
attributes.background: We are continually seeing more and more fake and libellous stories in MSM and from political organisations. MSM has a huge audience which can damage or ruin a an individual or organisations reputation. Hate crime online is now an arrestable offence. We need to treat fake news stories as hate crime.

rejection.details:
We can open accept petitions which call for actions that are the responsibility of the UK Government or Parliament.

It's the responsibility of the police and Crown Prosecution Service to decide whether behaviour should be treated as hate crime.

You can find out more about the prosecution of hate crimes here:

https://www.cps.gov.uk/hate-crime

You could start a new petition explaining clearly what you'd like the UK Government or Parliament to do.
